edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.inputter
Interface TextInputter

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTextInputter, DiskBasedXMLTextInputter, FirstTokenURLTextInputter, SimpleXMLTextInputter, URLTextInputter, XMLTextInputter
public interface TextInputter

Interface for retrieving text from a possibly segmented input source.

loadText

void loadText(java.net.URL url,
              java.lang.String encoding)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Reads text from a URL.

Parameters:
url - URL from which to read text.
encoding - Text encoding.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an error occurs.
java.lang.Exception

loadText

void loadText(java.net.URL url,
              java.lang.String encoding,
              java.lang.String xmlSchemaURI)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Reads text from a URL using a specified XML schema.

Parameters:
url - URL from which to read text.
encoding - Text encoding.
xmlSchemaURI - String URI specifying Xml schema.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If an error occurs.

The schema and schema type should be ignored when the input is not an XML file.

getSegmentCount

int getSegmentCount()
Returns number of text segments.

Returns:
Number of text segments.

getSegmentName

java.lang.String getSegmentName(int segmentNumber)
Returns name of specified segment.

Parameters:
segmentNumber - The segment number (starts at 0).
Returns:
The name for the specified segment number, or null if the segment number is invalid.

getSegmentText

java.lang.String getSegmentText(int segmentNumber)
Returns specified segment of loaded text.

Parameters:
segmentNumber - The segment number (starts at 0).
Returns:
The text for for the specified segment number, or null if the segment number is invalid. The returned text may be an empty string if the segment number is valid but the segment contains no text.

getSegmentText

java.lang.String getSegmentText(java.lang.String segmentName)
Returns specified segment of loaded text.

Parameters:
segmentName - The segment name.
Returns:
The text for for the specified segment name, or null if the segment name is invalid. The returned text may be an empty string if the segment name is valid but the segment contains no text.

setSegmentText

void setSegmentText(int segmentNumber,
                    java.lang.String segmentText)
Updates specified segment of loaded text.

Parameters:
segmentNumber - The segment number (starts at 0).
segmentText - The updated segment text.

setSegmentText

void setSegmentText(java.lang.String segmentName,
                    java.lang.String segmentText)
Returns specified segment of loaded text.

Parameters:
segmentName - The segment name.
segmentText - The updated segment text.

setSegmentText

void setSegmentText(int segmentNumber,
                    java.io.File segmentTextFile)
Updates specified segment of loaded text from file.

Parameters:
segmentNumber - The segment number (starts at 0).
segmentTextFile - The file containing the updated segment text.

                    java.io.File segmentTextFile)
Returns specified segment of loaded text.

Parameters:

enableGapFixer

void enableGapFixer(boolean fixGaps)
Enable gap element fixer.

Parameters:
fixGaps - true to fix gap tags.

enableOrigFixer

void enableOrigFixer(boolean fixOrigs)
Enable orig element fixer.

Parameters:
fixOrigs - true to fix orig tags.

enableSplitWordsFixer

void enableSplitWordsFixer(boolean fixSplitWords,
                           java.util.List<PatternReplacer> patternReplacers)
Enable split words fixer.

Parameters:
fixSplitWords - true to fix selected split words.
patternReplacers - Patterns for fixing split words.
